#summary How to compile the KedrahCore from the latest repository source code
#labels Featured,Phase-Implementation
 # Checkout the latest version of the code (see [SVNSetup])
 # Open the project file kedrahcore/KedrahCore.csproj in Visual Studio 2005 or later
 # Build the project by clicking Build > Build Solution
 # The DLL can be found at kedrahcore/bin/Release/KedrahCore.dll
